title: Use Newton's Second Law
text: Use Newton's Second Law $$(F=ma)$$ and the given values the thrust, frictional force, and mass of the system to calculate the acceleration of the rocket sled. Note that the net force equals to the thrust minus the frictional force.

title: Calculate the Acceleration
text: $$a=\frac{F}{m}$$, what is $$\frac{2.4\times{10}^4-650}{2100}$$? (round to the nearest integer)
